question: The 37th National Symposium of Heads of Police Training Institutions is being held in which Indian city?
explanation:
The 37th National Symposium of Heads of Police Training Institutions is being held at BPR&D Headquarters, New Delhi. The two-day symposium is held from 12-13 December 2019. The symposium is organized by the Bureau of Police Research and Development (BPR&D), Ministry of Home Affairs.
The theme of the two-day Symposium is Optimal Utilization of Resources â€“ Through Sharing and Networking.
